'''Emblem of Severed Fate'''{{Lang|ja=絶縁の旗印}} is an [[Artifact Set]] available at [[:Category:4-Star Artifacts|4-star]] and [[:Category:5-Star Artifacts|5-star]] rarities which can be obtained from [[Momiji-Dyed Court]] in [[Inazuma]].

==Lore==
{{ArtifactLore}}

==Trivia==
* The descriptions for this artifact set relate to some of the [[Amethyst Series]] weapons:
** [[Amenoma Kageuchi]] belongs to [[Iwakura Michihiro]], forged after he broke his blade fighting Teruyo.
** [[Katsuragikiri Nagamasa]] belongs to [[Mikoshi Nagamasa]], who is not mentioned in this artifact set but is related to it by being Doukei's adoptive brother.
** [[Hakushin Ring]] is narrated from Kitsune Saiguu's perspective, who is mentioned in passing as "Lady Saiguu" in Storm Cage's description.
* The description for Storm Cage (Sands of Eon piece) is told from [[Hibiki]]'s perspective, who is also the narrator for the artifacts in [[Shimenawa's Reminiscence]], the other 4–5{{star}} artifact set obtained from [[Momiji-Dyed Court]].
